A

Action - Interface in menuClases
This interface describes every action executed by every option in every MEnu.
activate() - Method in class menuClases.Menu
Executes the Action related o the user selection of the option in question.
AddNewCompanyAction - Class in menuClases
This class Describes the Add New Company Action of the Administration of Company's Menu.

This Class describes the Add new Shareholder Option of the Shareholder Administration Menu.
AddNewShareholderAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.AddNewShareholderAction
 
addSharesToCompany(Company, int) - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
This method will add an amount of Shares to a Company respectively inputed in the parameters;
AddSharesToCompanyAction - Class in menuClases
This Class describes the Add Shares to Company of the Administration of Stocks Menu
AddSharesToCompanyAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.AddSharesToCompanyAction
 
addShareToHolder(String) - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
Takes a string from the file where data is stored to be persisted and converts the data from string to object of type share and adds it to respective Shareholder and Company portfolio.
addToList(String, E) - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
This method is used to add Shareholders and Companies to their respective NamedList.
